record.id: field.name="incident.autoclose" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: incident.autoclose
record.file.name: environment

brief.brief: This option disables or enables the automatic closure of OMi incidents at the global level. OMi incidents refer to incidents opened from events in BSM Operations Manager i (OMi) after you have set up an OMi integration with Service Manager.
If not selected (set to false), no incidents will be automatically closed.
If selected (set to true), incidents will be automatically closed under the conditions specified in the OMI Auto-Close alert definition record.
